data.oai_dc:dc: Basic measurements of radiation at station Ilorin (2000-11)

Air temperature at 2 m height, Baseline Surface Radiation Network, BSRN, DATE/TIME, HEIGHT above ground, Humidity, relative, Hygrometer, ILO, Ilorin, Monitoring station, MONS, Nigeria, Pyranometer, Eppley, PSP, SN 17675F3, WRMC No. 38001, Short-wave downward (GLOBAL) radiation, Thermometer, WCRP/GEWEX
